mean_cn: adj. 全国范围的，全国性的；  adv. 在全国
mean_en: including or involving all parts of a nation or country
word_etyma: nation国家的+wide 广泛的→nationwide全国范围的
short_phrase: You can buy the newspaper nationwide.
sentence: Our newspaper is distributed nationwide all across China.
sentence_trans: 我们的报纸在全中国范围内派发。
